name: X - Fighter code: Mobius
description:
X - Fighter code: Mobius is a classic 2D arcade shooter.
The characteristics that we can highlight of this title
are the following:

  • Three different spacecraft designs.
  • Access to special weapons.
  • Access to secondary weapons.
  • A list  of interesting articles available at the game store.
  • And three incredible and unbeatable spaceships to continue your adventure in the "Extra Mode".

Extra Mode:

Basically it is an amplified game mode with the possibility to face more complicated and strong enemies.
This mode can be unlocked once player level 10 has been reached. From this point it is necessary to collect enough money to be able to buy the remaining spaceships, and to be able to freely access this section of the game.
